LanguageData.FCPShuttleCrashIntroText: Carried by the wind, the metallic harshness of a smoke plume draws your caravan to a shattered shuttle, its components scattered around its scorched landing zone. The still-burning electrical fire is testament to the remains’s freshness.
LanguageData.FCPShuttleCrashVariantA: Judging by the state of its occupants, its final descent was fatal, leaving behind its passengers’ possessions. Though undoubtedly damaged, they will be of more use to you than the uncaring wilderness.
